name: Ludum Dare 40 ClutterBug
description:
Ludum Dare 40. Theme: The more you have, the worse it is.

You are a hoarder. You are a proper consumer and buy tons of stuff and it piles up all over your house. Everyday you have to try to find your keys, wallet, and cellphone. Enjoy this "Where's Waldo" style game.

This is my first game jam, so I am extremely excited to have just finished something!
